notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by grants from Korea Research Institute of Bioscience and Biotechnology (KRIBB) Research Initiative Program (KGM9942011), from the Ministry of Trade, Industry & Energy (MOTIE), Korea Institute for Advancement of Technology (KIAT) through the Encouragement Program for The Industries of Economic Cooperation Region (P0006222), and from the National Research Foundation of Korea (NRF) grant funded through the Korea government (NRF-2018M3A9H4055203).
